---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
set.seed(1)
class1 <- data.frame(
  class = rep("1", 150),
  x = c(rnorm(25, 0, 1), rnorm(50, 0, 1), rnorm(50, 5, 2), rnorm(25, 8, 1)),
  y = c(rnorm(25, 0, 2), rnorm(50, -5, 2), rnorm(50, 1, 1), rnorm(25, -5, 2))
)
class2 <- data.frame(
  class = rep("2", 100),
  x = rnorm(100, 4, 1),
  y = rnorm(100, -5, 1)
)
dat <- bind_rows(class1, class2)
ggplot(dat, aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point(aes(fill = class, shape = class), size = 2.5, alpha = .75) +
  #ggalt::geom_encircle(data = filter(dat, class == "2")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#d8b365", "#5ab4ac")) +
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(21, 22)) +
  labs(x = "feature 1", y = "feature 2", fill = "label", shape = "label") +
  theme_classic(base_size = 20)
ggsave("pc0.png", width = 5.5, height = 4, units = "in")

ggplot(dat, aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point(aes(fill = class, shape = class), size = 2.5, alpha = .75) +
  ggalt::geom_encircle(data = filter(dat, class == "2"), size = 3) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("#d8b365", "#5ab4ac")) +
  scale_shape_manual(values = c(21, 22)) +
  labs(x = "feature 1", y = "feature 2", fill = "label", shape = "label") +
  theme_classic(base_size = 20)
ggsave("pc1.png", width = 5.5, height = 4, units = "in")
```
